chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> Zeven (ec m)

Premises:
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
Zeven = fun z : Z => match z with | 0 | Z.pos (_~0)%positive | Z.neg (_~0)%positive => True | _ => False end : Z -> Prop Argument scope is [Z_scope]
ec = fun m : fmap => nv m + ne m + nf m - nd m : fmap -> Z
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
nd_card : forall m : fmap, ndN m = card (fmap_to_set m)
MA1.incls_orbit : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> incls (MA1.Iter_orb m x) (fmap_to_set m)
MA1.incls_rem : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> incls (MA1.Iter_rem m x) (fmap_to_set m)
fmap_ind : forall P : fmap -> Prop, P V -> (forall f0 : fmap, P f0 -> forall (d : dart) (t : tag) (p : point), P (I f0 d t p)) -> (forall f1 : fmap, P f1 -> forall (d : dim) (d0 d1 : dart), P (L f1 d d0 d1)) -> forall f2 : fmap, P f2
surj_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim), inv_hmap m -> surj_dart (exd m) (cA_1 m k)
Zeven_ex : forall n : Z, Zeven n -> exists m : Z, n = 2 * m
MA1.exd_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (MA1.f m) n z)
MA0.exd_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (MA0.f m) n z)
MF.exd_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (MF.f m) n z)
Zeven_ex_iff : forall n : Z, Zeven n < -> (exists m : Z, n = 2 * m)
MA0.Iter_upb_period : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := MA0.Iter_upb m z in Iter (MA0.f m) nr z = z
MA1.Iter_upb_period : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := MA1.Iter_upb m z in Iter (MA1.f m) nr z = z
MA1.exd_diff_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MA1.diff_orb m z
MA0.exd_diff_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MA0.diff_orb m z
MF.exd_diff_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MF.diff_orb m z
MA1.upb_eq_degree : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MA1.Iter_upb m z = MA1.degree m z
MA0.f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> McA0.f_1 m (McA0.f m z) = z
cF_cF_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cF m (cF_1 m z) = z
MA0.ex_i_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := MA0.Iter_upb m z in {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) i z = Iter (MA0.f m) nr z}
MF.ex_i_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := MF.Iter_upb m z in {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (MF.f m) i z = Iter (MF.f m) nr z}
MA1.exds_orb_exd : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exds (MA1.Iter_orb m x) z -> exd m z
MA1.expo_exd : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> MA1.expo m z t -> exd m t
MA1.unicity_mod_p : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (j k : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := MA1.Iter_upb m z in (j < p)%nat -> (k < p)%nat -> Iter (MA1.f m) j z = Iter (MA1.f m) k z -> j = k
MA0.unicity_mod_p : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (j k : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := MA0.Iter_upb m z in (j < p)%nat -> (k < p)%nat -> Iter (MA0.f m) j z = Iter (MA0.f m) k z -> j = k
MF.unicity_mod_p : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (j k : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := MF.Iter_upb m z in (j < p)%nat -> (k < p)%nat -> Iter (MF.f m) j z = Iter (MF.f m) k z -> j = k
inj_neq : forall n m : nat, neq n m -> Zne (Z.of_nat n) (Z.of_nat m)
MA1.impls_orb : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> MA1.expo m x y -> impls (MA1.Iter_orb m x) (MA1.Iter_orb m y)
pred_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> exd m z
succ_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m z
succ_exd_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m (A m k z)

```coq
intros m; induction m using fmap_ind.
- simpl. auto.
- intros IHm0 x t p; simpl. 
  destruct (inv_hmap m0) as [Hinv_m0 _].
  assert (H1: Zeven (ec m0)). apply IHm0.
  assert (H2: Zeven (nv m0 + ne m0 + nf m0 - nd m0 + 1)). 
  rewrite <- H1. auto.
  apply Zeven_ex_iff in H2. destruct H2 as [m' H2].
  exists (m' + 1). omega.
- intros IHm1 k x y; simpl. 
  destruct (inv_hmap m1) as [Hinv_m1 _].
  assert (H1: Zeven (ec m1)). apply IHm1.
  assert (H2: Zeven (nv m1 + ne m1 + nf m1 - nd m1 + 2)). 
  rewrite <- H1. auto.
  apply Zeven_ex_iff in H2. destruct H2 as [m' H2].
  exists (m' + 1). omega.
Qed.```

original: intros m; induction m using fmap_ind. - simpl. auto. - intros IHm0 x t p; simpl. destruct (inv_hmap m0) as [Hinv_m0 _]. assert (H1: Zeven (ec m0)). apply IHm0. assert (H2: Zeven (nv m0 + ne m0 + nf m0 - nd m0 + 1)). rewrite <- H1. auto. apply Zeven_ex_iff in H2. destruct H2 as [m' H2]. exists (m' + 1). omega. - intros IHm1 k x y; simpl. destruct (inv_hmap m1) as [Hinv_m1 _]. assert (H1: Zeven (ec m1)). apply IHm1. assert (H2: Zeven (nv m1 + ne m1 + nf m1 - nd m1 + 2)). rewrite <- H1. auto. apply Zeven_ex_iff in H2. destruct H2 as [m' H2]. exists (m' + 1). omega.
